headline: AT&T News Signals Shifts In Governance Resilience And Network Opportunity
summary: AT&T (NYSE:T) has settled a lawsuit, clearing the way for shareholders to vote on whether the company should publish more detailed workforce diversity data. The company has joined as a founding member of the Alliance for Critical Infrastructure, a new group focused on protecting key national systems. AT&T is working with T Mobile and Verizon through Aduna to launch the first unified, CAMARA compliant network API coverage across the US market. For investors watching NYSE:T, these updates sit...
